text: Amidon may refer to: ==People== * Charles Fremont Amidon, a United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the District of North Dakota * Sam Amidon, an American folk artist * Kim Amidon, an American radio personality * Stephen Amidon, an American author and critic * George H. Amidon, a Vermont state commissioner of taxes and Vermont State Treasurer in U.S. * Roger Amidon, an early settler of the Massachusetts Bay Colony and a French Huguenot ==Other uses== * Amidon, North Dakota, county seat of Slope County, North Dakota * Amidon, a trade name for methadone
title: Amidon
